tool.name: SpectraST Import
tool.command: ## Symlink dataset to name with recognized ext #import re #set $ext = '.' + str($input.extension) #set $input_name = $re.sub('[.](ms2|msp|hlf)$','',$input.display_name.split('/')[-1]) + $ext ln -s '$input' '$input_name' && mkdir -p '$output.files_path' && spectrast -cN'${output.files_path}/library' '$input_name' | tee '$output'

param.name: input
param.label: Spectral library ms2, msp, or hlf

has_text_matching.expression: Total number of spectra in library: 1

tool.help:
**What it does**
Imports a spectral library from the following formats:
NIST (National Institute of Standards and Technology)'s .msp format X!Hunter's .hlf format BiblioSpec's .ms2 format
